title: HTTPSolrServer doesn't set own property correctly in setFollowRedirects
description:
in setFollowRedirects(boolean newValue)
HTTPSolr sets its internal property "followRedirects" always to true, regardless of the given parameter.

Patch and tests will follow tomorrow.

comments.author: Frank Wesemann
comments.content: This diff adds a test and a patch for HTTPSolrServer
